Avenge Glut's Circle Notes & Tips

You can use Glut to resurrect the Minotaurs, they carry Greatclub. You can use Glut to resurrect the Bulette. Note that if you choose to remain loyal to Spaw instead of Glut, his summoned minion will also attack you. Avoid this by desummoning any powerful minion before combat by reanimating a weaker enemy after the Duergar fight but before speaking with Glut again.
